page.title: 14LITTLE BARFORD POWER STATION
page.content: Qu.Did you ever have problems with children entering the power station and playing near the cables? An.No we did not have problems with children playing near the cables Qu.Were there people who swept the chimneys? How was this done? An.Yes we had the chimneys swept,it was done by water. Qu.Did people get dirty doing the job? An.Yes people did get dirty doing the job. Qu.Do you know why the station has been closed? An.Because it was getting too old. Qu.Did the power station use coal? An.Yes the power station did use coal. Qu.About how much in a day? A week? A year? An.A day.600 tons.A week.4,200tons A year.218,400tons.
